about_the_game:
You will direct AV! An AV production simulation game!

This game is a simulation where you can freely film, edit, and sell AV productions. The protagonist, driven by the need to repay their debts, teams up with the heroine, Himemiya Kazu, to explore a variety of creative scenarios!

As the game progresses, unlock new filming locations and use various props to create the ultimate AV masterpieces!

Filming, editing, selling—experience it all firsthand as the director!

After capturing captivating scenes driven by desire and instinct, the next step is the editing process. You'll experience cutting and editing each shot just like using professional video editing software. Additionally, you can set the title, genre, price, and more to elevate your work into a truly sensual masterpiece!

Once your creation goes on sale, its popularity will be determined by buyer reviews. The better the reviews, the greater the sales impact. To achieve higher ratings, you'll need to refine your filming techniques and composition. Sharpen your directing skills and aim for the top spot in the rankings!

A dramatic story woven between the heroine and three supporting female characters.

The central figures of this story are Takasuke Yasuda, the protagonist and a former AV industry professional, and the heroine, Kazu Himemiya. Their relationship begins as business partners but gradually develops into a unique bond.

Additionally, three supporting female characters make their appearance: Maiko, a former colleague; Reimu, the owner of a prop shop; and Yuna, a close friend. Interacting with these vibrant personalities will bring more inspiration and depth to your AV productions!

Strive to pay off your debt and succeed as a director—achieve both goals!

Takasuke faces a debt repayment challenge every five days. To manage this, you'll need to take on daily-wage jobs around town while securing funds to continue your filming activities.

Balancing creative production with financial management is the key to success. Overcome the pressure of debt repayment while expanding your business through AV production, and work your way toward becoming a top-tier director!

Character Introductions

Himemiya Nodoka

The main heroine of the story.

She is dating her childhood friend of the same age. While struggling with a significant debt for a certain reason, she crosses paths with the protagonist.

Maiko Akitsuki

A former colleague from the protagonist's previous company. She had quietly taken an interest in the protagonist while he was still working there. By chance, they meet again, and she offers advice on the protagonist's AV production.

Reimu

An older sister who runs a suspicious prop shop on the street. She provides the protagonist with various equipment and sells props specifically for AV production. It seems she has a husband, but she is the sole breadwinner, supporting the family on her own.

Yuna

The heroine's fashionable and bold classmate and close friend. Although she is worried about Nodoka's job, Nodoka never confides in her, which leaves Yuna constantly concerned.

Kousuke Yasuda
The protagonist of the story. He is a flawed character who enjoys vices like gambling and alcohol. After being fired from an AV production company, he spends his days immersed in gambling. However, after meeting Nodoka Himemiya, he believes he can start his own AV company and make a lot of money.
Aoya Nakayama
Nodoka's boyfriend and childhood friend. Having known each other since they were young, they understand each other very well. However, they have never discussed the topic of debt.

Game Features

  • 17 Scenes

  • 4 Heroine Characters

  • 34 Different Scenarios

  • 18 Transition Events

  • Over 800 Animations

  • Over 20 Minutes of Cutscene Animations

  • Over 35 CG Images

  • 5 Additional Costumes

  • Over 250,000 Words of Dialogue

  • Over 26 Hours of Recorded Voice Acting

  • 4 Mini-Games

  • Gameplay Time: 10 to 20 Hours

  • Over 110 Types of Props

  • Supported Languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish, Korean
